objects.text:
• Durable Faux Leather
• Elegant Design with Gold Hardware
• Spacious Interior Storage
• Includes Detachable Shoulder Strap

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and elegant layout promoting a luxury tote bag. The composition is anchored by a large, central product image ("product_image") which gives prominence to the stylish handbag. The title text ("heading") is bold and commanding, followed by a sophisticated subheading ("subheading") that matches the upscale tone. A descriptive block ("description") to the left of the product outlines key features in bullet points, enhancing the informative aspect. The price ("price") is prominently displayed in the bottom left quadrant, ensuring high visibility. A call-to-action button ("cta") sits just below the price, centered inside a shaded rectangle ("cta_background"). The soft geometric background adds depth without distracting from the main focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream: `#F5EFE7`
- Warm Beige: `#D0B49F`
- Golden Tan: `#C29F82`
- Deep Cocoa (text): `#5D4037`
- Rosewood Accent (button): `#8D6E63`
- White (for CTA text): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: This product image showcases a minimalist yet luxurious handbag in a sophisticated warm taupe-brown color (#A9746E). The rich leather texture provides depth, while the subtle crosshatch pattern adds dimension. The accents and hardware in polished metallic gold (#D4AF37) act as focal points, creating a striking contrast that elevates the overall look. These two primary hues are harmoniously blended—brown offering a grounded elegance and gold delivering a touch of luxury. A cream or off-white background (#F5F5F5) would complement these tones in an advertisement banner, ensuring the product remains center-stage yet glowingly highlighted through contrast and visual warmth.
